Best Buddies Jobs is a freestanding, community-based program offered at no cost to an employer. Best Buddies Jobs works with you to assess your company’s employment needs and then identifies a competent, productive and loyal employee to fulfil those needs. Additionally, Best Buddies Jobs provides ongoing services throughout the duration of employment.
